articles.title: Pakistan skipper Babar Azam slams comparisons with Virat Kohli says, ‘he’s elder to me, learned a lot…' | Mint - Mint

articles.title: Despite Winning 8 Titles and Amassing $1,000,000,000 Net Worth, Toto Wolff Lacks 'Understanding' of Running an F1 Team; Claims Christian Horner - The SportsRush - The Sportsrush
articles.description: After winning 8 titles with Mercedes and having a net worth of $1 billion, Christian Horner feels Toto Wolff does not know how to run a team.
